text: Kaadu maaluk Yalli koh yeceemit akeer칙 dabqih galt칩 gurrus meqem kaat abtaamal addunyal, addunyak isi maglab (aft칩) mahawweeninaay, Yalli koh kah yemqe innah Yallih naqoosah emeq, kaadu ama maalut Yalli caraamu kol abem magurrisinaay baaxo umaanet mabaysin, diggah Yalli baaxo baysa mara makicnaay ken digaal치h
